snippet: More than 10 people were killed and a United Nations employee was shot and wounded when clashes broke out at a peace meeting in South Sudan, United Nations officials said Friday.
abstract: More than 10 people are killed and a United Nations employee is shot and wounded when clashes break out at a peace meeting in South Sudan.
lead_paragraph: More than 10 people were killed and a United Nations employee was shot and wounded when clashes broke out at a peace meeting in South Sudan, United Nations officials said Friday.

headline.main: South Sudan: Violence at Peace Meeting
headline.print_headline: South Sudan: Violence at Peace Meeting
